summary: Dragon Slayer written in the Dragon language on your knuckles.
descriptionHtml:
First mod, but very simple. DOVahKRiiD written on the knuckles. DOVahKRiiD means Dragon Slayer in the Dragon language. This is only for females at the moment. If there is enough demand for a male version I will make a male version (or if I get bored).

The hand textures used are from Caliente\'s resource files he/she released. It is highly recommended that you use Caliente\'s hand/feet version as it has it\'s own meshes for the hands. If you don\'t use the Caliente\'s hand/feet version and use this mod the textures will surely not match up correctly. I may upload vanilla hand textures/whatever other hand texture there may be, if there is demand for it.

Caliente link: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
author: NuBZiLLa

files.name: Dova Kiin tattoo in oblivion font
